name: Hoplegs (itch)
description:
Hoplegs is a different kind of platform where you control
your character using 4 different legs. Looks easy?
Each of the four gamepad buttons where you usually jump
interact, crouch and change weapons are now your legs! 
Master the unique controls, and navigate through loads
of developer and community-created levels.
